Welcome to rocket_relations

This package provides formulas for evaluating ideal rocket flow relations, including characteristic velocity (c*) and thrust coefficient (c_f) under calorically perfect gas and isentropic nozzle assumptions.

Contents:

  • rocket_relations package
    • Submodules
    • rocket_relations.ideal module
    • Module contents
  • API Reference

Usage Example

from rocket_relations import c_star, c_f

gamma = 1.2
R = 350
T0 = 3500

print(c_star(gamma, R, T0))
